extensionDescription.message: Send the magnet link to download.

textAboutOptions.message:
This plugin send the magnet link to download using de Deluge-Web.
Deluge-Web is a feature of deluge itself, at this link you can find more about deluge-web.

errorUrlOptions.message: Not informed the deluge-web url in the options panel
errorUrlOptions.description: Error when not informe the deluge-web url in extension options.

errorQueryUrl.message: Can't find the tab to the informed url, $URL$ => $URLPATTERN$
errorQueryUrl.description: Error when cant find the deluge-web tab

errorDelugeMethod.message: Receive the error '$ERROR$' when trying to send method '$METHOD$'
errorDelugeMethod.description: Error when response request came with error from deluge.

errorXmlHttpRequest.message: Error, received status $STATUS$ when trying send xmlHttpRequest $METHOD$
errorXmlHttpRequest.description: Error when get some problem to send a request to deluge.
